name: Dinari MELI
description: The Dinari MELI dShares token (MELI.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in MercadoLibre, Inc. (NASDAQ: MELI), the largest e-commerce and fintech company in Latin America. MercadoLibre operates an extensive online marketplace, digital payments ecosystem, and logistics network, enabling seamless e-commerce transactions across multiple countries. Each MELI.d token is fully backed by a corresponding MELI stock share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, MELI.d provides investors with exposure to one of the fastest-growing technology companies in emerging markets, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
